Dear friends,

It’s sunny, it’s warm and that’s all I was asking for. Now let’s make the most of it, shall we?

I have updated new videos of readings I did for several Casting Directors. They showcase me pretty well, take a look at them here!

And I’d like to share an awesome tool: Bananatag. It tracks important emails you send and lets you know when they were opened and if any of your links were clicked. It’s so easy, just enjoy.

Be well!
